text: From the Ground Up is a 1921 American comedy silent black and white film directed by E. Mason Hopper and based on the short story by Rupert Hughes. ==Cast== * Tom Moore as Terence Giluley * Helene Chadwick as Philena Mortimer * DeWitt Jennings as Mr. Mortimer * Grace Pike as Mrs. Mortimer * Hardee Kirkland as Carswell Sr * Darrell Foss as Carswell Jr ==References== ==External links== * Category:Films directed by E. Mason Hopper Category:Films based on works by Rupert Hughes Category:American comedy films Category:1921 comedy films Category:1921 films Category:American silent films Category:American black-and-white films Category:Goldwyn Pictures films Category:American films
title: From the Ground Up (film)
